title: If this survives for an hour, it passes the Bear Test.
description:
At the Grizzly & Wolf Discovery Center in West Yellowstone, Montana, you can get a product certified as bear-resistant... by actual bears. ■ The Center: https://www.grizzlydiscoveryctr.org/

Camera by Erik Resel at Backcountry Media https://backcountrymedia.com
Edited by Julian Domanski

I'm at https://tomscott.com
on Twitter at https://twitter.com/tomscott

and on Instagram as tomscottgo
